question_1.question: What is the default port number for Theobald Xtract Universal (XU) when installed on the TimeXtender application server?
question_1.explanation: The default port for Theobald Xtract Universal (XU) is 8065, as mentioned in the instructions for editing parameters in xu_rsd_gen.env.

question_2.question: Which of the following is a prerequisite for setting up Theobald Xtract Universal (XU)?

options.option_a: Install a SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)
options.option_b: Ensure Python version 3.8 or later is installed
options.option_d: Download the latest version of the xu-rsd-generator utility

question_2.explanation: One of the prerequisites listed for setting up Theobald Xtract Universal is to ensure Python (version 3.8 or later) is installed.
